name: Membership Status Detail
query:
SELECT
  customer_name AS 'Member Name',
  identification_number AS 'ID Card N0',
  gender AS 'Gender',
  customer_group AS 'Group', 
  member_category AS 'Category',
  occupation AS 'Occupation',
  email AS 'Email',
  phone_number AS 'Phone No',
  credit_limit AS 'Credit Limit',
  remaining_balance AS 'Remaining Balance',
  points AS 'Points',
  points_expiry_date AS 'Points Expiry',
  CASE
    WHEN disabled = 0 THEN 'Active'
    WHEN disabled = 1 THEN 'Disable'
  END AS 'Status'
FROM
  tabCustomer;
